mutation {
  createCollection (
    input: {
      name: "NewCollection"
      description: "New Collection"
      group: "dataplattform@nav.no"
      keywords: ["keyword1"]
    }
  ) {
    id
    name
    description
    owner { group }
    elements {type: __typename}
  }
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "createCollection": {
      "name": "NewCollection",
      "description": "New Collection",
      "owner": {
        "group": "dataplattform@nav.no"
      },
      "elements": []
    }
  }
}

STORE collection_id=data.createCollection.id
